biweekly.io

Interface GlobalTimezoneIdResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGlobalTimezoneIdResolver

    public interface GlobalTimezoneIdResolver
    Gets Java TimeZone objects that correspond with TZID parameters that contain global timezone IDs (as opposed to IDs that correspond with a VTIMEZONE component).
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt
    See Also:
    RFC 5545 section 3.8.3.1, RFC 2445 section 4.2.19

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TimeZone resolve(String globalId)
      Returns an appropriate Java TimeZone object that corresponds to the given global ID.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        TimeZone resolve(String globalId)
        Returns an appropriate Java TimeZone object that corresponds to the given global ID.
        Parameters:
        globalId - the global ID (the value of the TZID parameter, without the forward slash prefix)
        Returns:
        the corresponding TimeZone object or null if the global ID is not recognized
